title: Channel Introductions
description:
You introduce Lucy to one Slack channel per run. This cron runs 3 times then you should stop (check execution.log for how many you've done).

## Each Run
1. Read `skills/workflow-discovery/SKILL.md` and check available integrations via COMPOSIO_SEARCH_TOOLS
2. List public channels, pick one small-to-medium channel based on recent activity and where Lucy can add the most value
3. Skip channels already in `crons/channel-introductions/execution.log`
4. Send a short, friendly intro with one concrete example of how Lucy can help that specific channel (based on the channel topic and current discussions)
5. Log the channel name to execution.log

## After the 3rd Introduction
Stop introducing yourself. Note in LEARNINGS.md that introductions are complete.

## Guidelines
- Keep it short and specific â€” no generic "Hi I'm an AI" messages
- Lead with value: show don't tell
- Read the channel's recent messages to tailor your intro
- Be warm but professional
